text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria elachistantha is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania.
text.Sources: Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. (1998). "Psychotria elachistantha". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T35460A9934143. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T35460A9934143.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
